page.title: 08A MARKET GARDENER.
page.content: Mr Gower owns a market garden at Bletherdon,Coffinswell covering 4 acres.He grows vegetables eg lettuce, carrots,radishes and fruits eg strawberries, blackcurrants.He sells them to wholesalers throughout Torbay. After delivering he does his bookwork, this takes him to 2 or 3pm.The rest of the time he spends as leisure.He did for a time deal with pig farming,but sold off all his stock as meat was not selling sufficiently.He has a son and daughter,his son has taken an interest in the business and wishes to take over from his father.He has had chicken theives in the past.He checks his crops regularly and spends a lot of time and money spraying his crops with insect repellent.He is on high ground with suitable drainage so there rarely is flooding.
